attributes.action: UK to support peace in Palestine and helping re-build a peaceful Palestine state
attributes.additional_details: Help Palestine people that live there the freedom and stop illegal rebuilding in places where they live. We should all get together for all the children in Palestine because we care,they are suffering, and because children die from hunger.We have got to understand the suffering and we’re ignoring them, these deaths are preventable.We have got to understand people in the third world countries think, and care, and smile, and cry just like us.The dream is to stop hunger by the year 2015,  The dream is to give the poor a chance, to save the hundreds of people who die, The dream can come and will come true, If we all work together and look in to the future and see the light that shines through these people...
